$:/core/macros/tabs.title: $:/core/macros/tabs
$:/core/macros/tabs.text:

<$list filter="$tabsList$" variable="currentTab"><$set name="save-currentTiddler" value=<>><$tiddler tiddler=<>><$button set=<> setTo=<> default="$default$" selectedClass="tc-tab-selected" tooltip={{!!tooltip}}> <$transclude tiddler={{!!icon}}/> <$tiddler tiddler=<>> <$set name="tv-wikilinks" value="no"> <$transclude tiddler=<> field="caption"> <$macrocall $name="currentTab" $type="text/plain" $output="text/plain"/> <$link to=<> >{{$:/core/images/link}}
<$list filter="$tabsList$" variable="currentTab"> <$reveal type="match" state=<> text=<> default="$default$"> <$transclude tiddler="$template$" mode="block"> <$transclude tiddler=<> mode="block"/>
\end

$:/core/ui/ControlPanel/Settings/link-to.title: $:/core/ui/ControlPanel/Settings/link-to-tabs
$:/core/ui/ControlPanel/Settings/link-to.caption: Link-to-Tabs plugin
$:/core/ui/ControlPanel/Settings/link-to.text:
<$checkbox tiddler="$:/plugins/wikilabs/link-to-tabs/config" field="show-all-links" checked="inline" unchecked="none" default="none"> Show internal tab link for ''all tabs''</$checkbox>

<$checkbox tiddler="$:/plugins/wikilabs/link-to-tabs/config" field="show-single-link" checked="inline" unchecked="none" default="inline"> Show internal tab link for ''selected tabs''</$checkbox>

$:/plugins/wikilabs/link-to-tabs/config.title: $:/plugins/wikilabs/link-to-tabs/config

$:/plugins/wikilabs/link-to-tabs/styles.title: $:/plugins/wikilabs/link-to-tabs/styles
$:/plugins/wikilabs/link-to-tabs/styles.text:
.wltc-link-to-tab {
  display: {{$:/plugins/wikilabs/link-to-tabs/config!!show-all-links}};
  position: relative;
  top: -1em;
  left: -1.3em;
  font-size: 0.7em;
  opacity: 0.7;
  margin-right: -1em;
}

.wltc-link-to-tab svg{
  width: 1.4em;
  height: 1.4em;
}

.wltc-link-to-tab:hover {
  opacity: 1;
}

.tc-tab-selected + .wltc-link-to-tab {
  display: {{$:/plugins/wikilabs/link-to-tabs/config!!show-single-link}};
}

.tc-vertical > .wltc-link-to-tab {
  top: -1.9em;
  left: 0;
  height: 0;
  float: right;
}

$:/plugins/wikilabs/link-to-tabs/readme.title: $:/plugins/wikilabs/link-to-tabs/readme
$:/plugins/wikilabs/link-to-tabs/readme.text:
